title: Lowest CO2 Emissions Change Since 1990
description: Ukraine has achieved a significant reduction in carbon dioxide emissions, with a decrease of 82.66% since 1990 as of 2023.

title: Highest Military Expenditure as % of GDP
description: In 2023, Ukraine's military expenditure reached 36.65% of its GDP, one of the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Population Growth Rate
description: Ukraine experienced a significant population decline, with an annual growth rate of -8.42% in 2023.

title: Lowest Rural Population Growth Rate
description: The rural population in Ukraine decreased by 9.01% annually in 2023, indicating a significant decline.

title: Lowest Urban Population Growth Rate
description: Ukraine's urban population growth rate was -8.17% in 2023, reflecting a substantial decrease.
